channel.title: Exfat on Kyk's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Exfat on Kyk's Blog

item.title: Detect exfat disk in mac
item.description: Cannot detect exfat external drive in my macbook. Here the solution, diskutil list get the identifer of the disk, eg: disk2s2 ps -ax | grep <identifier> get the proccess id of fsck sudo kill -9 <process id> Alert pops up and I can access the disk in finder.
